choices.name: deceasedMovement
choices.choiceText: Mark Animal as deceased and clear location

decisions.name: Is_the_Animal_Deceased_with_an_Active_Deceased_Movement_Record
decisions.label: Is the Animal Deceased with an Active Deceased Movement Record

rules.name: Deceased_with_Non_Deceased_Movement_record
rules.label: Deceased with Non Deceased Movement record

Flow.description: Flow to move animals between locations. Creates Movement records and updates various statuses

formulas.name: taskSubjectFormula
formulas.expression: CASE({!Choose_a_Movement}, {!adoptedMovement}, ("Prepare " + {!AnimalName} + " for new Owners"), {!boardingMovement}, ("Move " + {!AnimalName} + " to Boarding Unit " + {!newLocationName}) , {!fosterMovement}, ("Move " + {!AnimalName} + " to Foster " + {!newLocationName}), {!housedMovement}, ("Move " + {!AnimalName} + " to " + {!newLocationName}), {!transferredMovement}, ("Move " + {!AnimalName} + " to Organisation " + {!newLocationName}), {!releaseMovement}, ("Prepare " + {!AnimalName} + " for Release"), "None")

Flow.label: Animal - Movement Process

recordLookups.name: Get_Current_Movement_and_Location_Record_ID
recordLookups.label: Get Current Movement and Location Record ID

recordUpdates.name: Update_Animal_Deceased_Date_and_Status
recordUpdates.label: Update Animal Deceased Date and Status

recordUpdates.name: Update_Animal_Location_Status_for_Transferred_and_Fostered
recordUpdates.label: Update Animal Location Status for Transferred and Fostered

recordUpdates.name: Update_Animal_Location_Status_to_Housed
recordUpdates.label: Update Animal Location Status to Housed

recordUpdates.name: Update_Animal_Location_Status_to_Release
recordUpdates.label: Update Animal Location Status to Release

fields.name: Animal_Already_Deceased_Text
fields.fieldText: This animal is marked as deceased, but has a current location.

fields.name: Is_this_Correct
fields.fieldText: Is this Correct

fields.name: Animal_Already_Deceased_Text_1
fields.fieldText: Choose Yes to update the animals movement details as deceased. Choose No to exit and confirm animals status

screens.name: Animal_Already_Deceased_With_Correct_Movement_Record
screens.label: Animal Already Deceased With Correct Movement Record

fields.name: Animal_Already_Deceased_Text_0
fields.fieldText:
OOPS!


This animal is currently marked as deceased and cannot be moved to another location.


If this is an error, please review the animal record information and update it accordingly.

fields.name: Animal_Has_Existing_Location_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText:
Hmm! This animal already has a current location


{!LocationName}


Continuing will free up the current location and allow you to assign a new location.


To leave the animal in its current location, exit here

fields.name: Do_you_wish_to_continue
fields.fieldText: Do you wish to continue?

fields.name: Boarder_Selection_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText: Select a Unit where the animal will be boarded

fields.name: Boarder_Selection
fields.fieldText: Boarder Selection

fields.name: Check_Deceased_Animal_Text
fields.fieldText: Ok, please review the animals status and movement record

fields.name: Deceased_Selection_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText: Animal Status and Deceased Date have been updated

fields.name: Error_Movement_Records_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText:
OOPS!


It appears this animal seems to be in multiple locations at once, and has multiple movement records that are marked as current.


Please check the movement records for this animal, resolve this issue and try again.

fields.name: Error_Text
fields.fieldText:
Oh no! There has been an error!


Try and use the previous button below to go back a step and try again. If the problem persists please take a note of the fault message below and send it to your Salesforce Administrator or Salesforce Support.


Fault Message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Error_Text_2
fields.fieldText:
Oh no! There has been an error!


Try and use the previous button below to go back a step and try again. If the problem persists please take a note of the fault message below and send it to your Salesforce Administrator or Salesforce Support.


Fault Message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Finish_Text
fields.fieldText: Click Finish to exit to wizard.

fields.name: Foster_Selection_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText: Choose a Foster from the selection below

fields.name: Foster_Selection
fields.fieldText: Foster Selection

fields.name: Initial_Text
fields.fieldText: Use this wizard to provide an update that the animal is being moved, adopted or has been unfortunately PTS.

fields.name: Screen_TypeOfMovement_Info
fields.fieldText:
Type of Movement

Select a type from the picklist below.

fields.name: Choose_a_Movement
fields.fieldText: Choose a Movement

fields.name: Screen_Deceased_Information
fields.fieldText: Note: If you select to Mark the animal as deceased, then the animal's status will be updated and today's date will be used for the deceased date.

fields.name: Screen_Generate_Tasks_Information
fields.fieldText:
Generate Salesforce Tasks

If you would like to generate Salesforce Tasks for this schedule, please toggle the option below to on.

fields.name: Movement_Complete_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText:
Records Updated!


Thank you for updating the animals location. Please click Finish to complete the wizard.

fields.name: Organisation_Selection_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText: Choose an Organisation from the selection below

fields.name: Organisation_Selection
fields.fieldText: Organisation Selection

fields.name: Release_Error_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText:
Oh no! There has been an error attempting to create the Release records!


If available, try and use the previous button below to go back a step and try again. If the problem persists please take a note of the fault message below and send it to your Salesforce Administrator or Salesforce Support.


Fault Message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Release_Notification_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText:
The Animal has been marked for release, and a task has been generated.


Use the release process to capture the release location.

fields.name: Task_Error_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText:
There has been an error creating the Task records


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Unit_Selection_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText: Select a Unit where the animal will be housed

fields.name: Unit_Selection
fields.fieldText: Unit Selection
